updates.title: Google launches Gemini AI assistant for Android Auto, replacing Google Assistant with enhanced voice capabilities for playlists, email, and city information while driving.
Google releases Nano Banana Pro image generation model with advanced editing features, higher resolutions, improved text rendering, and web search capabilities.
Voice AI company Wispr raises $25M from Notable Capital just months after its $30M Series A, as their dictation app gains significant traction in the market.
Swatch partners with OpenAI to launch AI-DADA tool, allowing customers to design custom watches using AI prompts, marking a major brand's integration of generative AI into product customization.
Warner Music settles copyright lawsuit with AI music platform Udio and signs licensing deal, enabling users to create remixes and new songs using participating artists' voices and compositions.
